name: EXTREME BREAD MAN
description:
https://itch.io/jam/godot-wild-jam-51/rate/1787951

The seagulls have invaded, and as a piece of bread, you are in big danger. But armed with your trusty water gun, you might just have a chance to survive.

Made for Godot Wild Jam #51

I overscoped a little, things I  had to scrap:

- More nozzles (shooting more than 1 water per shot, like a shotgun)

- More seagull types (Like a ranged seagull)

- Some way of separating getting upgrades from the main game loop (Seagulls try to kill you while trying to upgrade your weapon, which is annoying)

- Explosions (Per the theme wildcards)

Design Document

Source Code
